title: Boeing loses ground to Airbus on jet deliveries as production issues continue to weigh
text:
See also: Delta Air reports this week, giving investors a first look into U.S. airlines' performances

Airbus on Monday said it delivered 611 jets in 2021 and won orders for 771, or 507 net of cancellations.

An expanded version of this report appears at WSJ.com.
